author: n.kkkerwer
content:
Hey everyone, I'd like to share and ask for input on an idea. Could be useful for EIP analysis and research. 

**Idea**: Translate EIP data into semantic triples to allow enhanced querying of all things EIP.
**Project**: Set up a prototypic SPARQL endpoint with data from the EIP Github Repo & created Instructions for how to query this data.
**Feedback** via the survey link (anonymous Lime survey or any other reply) would be highly appreciated!!!!

All info's can be found on my GH website: 
itsnilskerwer.github.io
Or via the repo "eip-rdf" on my profile.

Best Nils ❤️ happy to meet everyone!

(Disclaimer: Sorry if this is the wrong place to post. Reddit, ethereum research/ magicians do not let me post due to "new acc" restrictions. The intro channel seems to be for portfolios mainly ^^ If you could direct me somewhere more appropriate that would be appreciated.)
